entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Weyburn
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:55 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Weyburn 12:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -12.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -14.8°C
Wind: NNW 46 km/h gust 57 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 11 with temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11 with temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 13.
